ObjectClass.Name: Medusa (Pharoligo)
ObjectClass.Description:
MEDUSA/PHAROLIGO: Slow biological siege aircraft Powerful standoff-range strategic bomber
Fires slow moving expolsive projectile Strong vs stationary targets Can progenerate base Octo and Sepi pair

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: Move to specified location\ \Movement drains Weapon Charge \Move Speed: 3 (aircraft)\Vision Range: 36, Aggro Radius: 35

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location \Severe fatigue when Venting below 100 \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs ]\Gnd: 400, R 30, SR 5, Sta S (C)\Air: 30, R 30, SR 4, Sta S (C)

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Change Commander
Objective.Details: Set an Arcticus as commander or set\target's Arcticus as own commander

Objective.Name: Remove from Heirarchy
Objective.Details: Remove from command hierarchy\ \Disconnect from commander

Objective.Name: Lead group
Objective.Details: \Take lead of everyone that\reports to this unit's Arcticus

Objective.Name: Fire Temporal Disruption Beam
Objective.Details: Not Available \ Requires the Specials or Weapons\ upgrade at the MOUND

Objective.Name: Fire Temporal Disruption Beam
Objective.Details: \Instantly eliminate a single target\ \Range: 34 vs all\Air targets require extra 8s lock-on

Objective.Name: Meiotic Progenesis
Objective.Details: Not Available \ Requires the Loligo Tech upgrade

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to location in time\ \Must not have a TSS\Recharges Shields 50%

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Not Available\Must upgrade Chronoporting\in Mound building

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\ Must be near a Teleporter

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to location in time\ \Must not have a TSS\Recharges Shields 50%
